entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-05-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Authorization - AuthorizeRouteView NotAuthorized tag not triggered when directly accessing /auth from address bar in the browser #55911
  • OpenIdConnectAuthenticationHandler: message.State is null or empty #55910
  • Cascading App.razor component for all pages and components in Blazor #55909
  • Perf regression: mvc #55908
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, json #55907
  • [9.0-preview.4] Remove default tag with the assembly name from OpenAPI document (#55884 ) #55906
  • gRPC json transcoding: Exclude fields referenced in the path from the body in swagger #55899
  • DistributedCache : ForceReconnect does not work correctly with ConnectionMultiplexerFactory #55898

Closed

  • SignalR TS HttpConnection._resolveUrl fails if URL starts with "ws+unix:" (area-signalr) #51185
  • [Java client] OkHttp 3 has vulnerabilities that are fixed in OkHttp4 #46926
    8.0-preview4
  • Perf regression: plaintext #55855
  • Perf improvement: connectionclose, plaintext, plainTextWithFilter #55896
  • net8 Razor Pages Web App with Blazor Component. Component not working from csthml page #55415
  • Perf improvement: plainTextEmptyFilter #55885

PullRequests

Created

  • Update .NET SDK to 9.0.100-preview.6.24277.1 #55900
    area-infrastructure, Type: Dependency Update :arrow_up_small:
  • Log whether the localization resource is found or not #55897
    area-mvc, community-contribution

Merged

  • [browser] Support separation hybrid globalization JS code to es6 module #55716
    area-blazor, arch-wasm, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6

Updated

  • Fix AntiforgeryMiddlewareTest for non-US date formats #55779
    area-mvc, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun, 9.0-preview6
  • Enable input number component to support type='range' attribute #55583
    area-blazor, community-contribution, pending-ci-rerun
  • Fixed LDAP nested group claims #55707
    community-contribution, area-security
  • QuickGrid: Add EventCallback<TGridItem> for clicking on a row. #55851
    area-blazor, community-contribution
